description: A template to create and deploy your ruboty on slack.

SLACK_TOKEN.description: Account's token. get one on https://api.slack.com/web#basics

SLACK_EXPOSE_CHANNEL_NAME.description: If this set to 1, message.to will be channel name instead of id (optional).

SLACK_IGNORE_GENERAL.description: If this set to 1, bot ignores all messages on #general channel (optional)

SLACK_GENERAL_NAME.description: Set general channel name if your Slack changes general name (optional).

name: Ruboty
